EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Joining Pivotal at Hadoop Summit!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thanks for visiting Pivotal at Hadoop Summit in San Jose. We hope you enjoyed learning how Pivotal enables data-driven enterprises to create modern, software experiences for their customers.
In case you missed anything, here’s a quick recap:
- The Pivotal session at the event provided a unique look at new developments in the rapidly-changing world of the Internet of Things (IoT) and data science. The presentation slides are available here <http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/internet-of-things-how-data-science-driven-software-is-eating-the-connected-world>. - Sandeep Madra <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xIIcXdAAjw8&feature=youtu.be> and Michael Cucchi <https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AfarNiy6qxA&feature=youtu.be> spoke with theCUBE about how Pivotal is helping customers on their transformational journeys. - Pivotal helped educate attendees about the Open Data Platform Initiative <http://opendataplatform.org/> (ODP). Check out this blog <http://blog.opendataplatform.org/the-100-day-progress-report-on-the-odp/> for additional information about the widespread support for ODP and the initiative’s ability to create a new type of platform for the advancement of big data projects. - Recently, Pivotal announced the acquisition of Quickstep Technologies, which will improve SQL query execution performance across Pivotal Big Data Suite <http://pivotal.io/big-data/pivotal-big-data-suite> – targeting an order of magnitude acceleration of business intelligence, ad-hoc query, analytics and data science workloads for Pivotal customers. Additional details are included in this press release <http://pivotal.io/big-data/press-release/pivotal-acquires-quickstep-technologies> and blog <http://blog.pivotal.io/big-data-pivotal/news-2/jignesh-patel-on-pivotals-acquisition-of-big-data-project-quickstep>.
Want to embrace digital transformation? Come see Pivotal in action at a Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow> or Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow> near you.
We look forward to seeing you at the next Pivotal event <https://pivotal.io/news-events>!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
